sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>big</radical> <radical>turkey</radical> in the <radical>rice paddy</radical> is getting all <kanji>stirred up</kanji>. He's kicking up all the rice. Who stirred him up?
meaningInfo: He is a really big turkey too. Like, 12 feet tall, or something. Don't want to stir up a turkey that's that big.
readingMnemonic: While the turkey is <kanji>stirred up</kanji>, it also looks like it's having a lot of <reading>fun</reading> (<ja>ふん</ja>).
readingInfo: Is it laughing? Oh no, this is bad, it's enjoying being stirred up, now we'll never stop it.
